mean_cn: n. 支架，断头台，脚手架，脚手架材料；  vt. 给…搭脚手架
mean_en: a temporary or movable platform or structure on which a person stands or sits while working high above the floor or ground
short_phrase: climb up the scaffold outside the building
sentence: Construction workers stand on the scaffold to build the roof of the house.
sentence_trans: 建筑工人们站在脚手架上完成房顶的修建工作。
